attributes.action: Reverse plans for mandatory Covid-19 vaccination to access venues.
attributes.additional_details: The right to medical autonomy and self-determination over one's own body is a fundamental component of a democratic and free society. By stating that Covid-19 vaccination will be mandatory to access nightclubs in England, and by reserving the right to implement this in other sectors, the government has stepped away from democracy and into dictatorship. It is not and will never be correct to remove someone's right to self-determine what medical procedures they undergo, including vaccination.
attributes.background: Halt the proposed implementation of mandatory Covid-19 vaccination to access nightclubs and other venues, and guarantee this will not be implemented to access any other business or event.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
